description: Peter is at his locker gym rummaging through his bag when a longtime friend Mike comes walking in. The two haven't seen each other since they last hooked up which was at least ten years ago. Mike has a wife now and Peter was the last guy he played with. The two still have a strong connection and it's undeniable to ignore. They can't take it no longer and strip down. They both swap sucks enjoying the taste which they haven't had in years. Mike can't believe how great Peter's ass feels. He hasn't fucked any ass since the last time they fucked. He misses the way it feels and now wants Peter to fuck him just like the old days. They flip flop into different positions fucking one another as if it time never slipped by. Enjoy!
title: A Locker Room Affair
